front.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Information Technology--Telecommunications and Information Exchange Between Systems--Local and Metropolitan Area Networks--Specific Requirements--Part 11: Wireless LAN Medium Access Control (MAC) and Physical Layer (PHY) Specifications. front.abstract: This document defines enhancements to the 802.11 PHY and MAC to support operation in the 3650Â¿3700 MHz band in the United States of America.
